content.question: Which of the following is an effect of the Seventeenth Amendment?

choices.label: State legislatures gained more power over national and local elections.
People could participate in the political process by directly electing the senators.
Suffrage for women greatly expanded in national elections.
African American males could vote in national and state elections.

content.answer: People could participate in the political process by directly electing the senators.

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
